name: Broadside
body:
### Welcome to Broadside
This is the page for Broadside, an Android Mobile Game developed in Eclipse. 
-Matthew O'Dea

```
$ cd your_repo_root/repo_name
$ git fetch origin
$ git checkout gh-pages
```

This was developed in Fall 2013.

### Design
All graphics were original, and created by Matt O'Dea using Adobe Illustrator.

### Coding
Coding was done as a collaboration effort, by a group of 9, all in raw Java. This was especially a challenge without a game engine, done in a semester. The group still managed to hard code path systems, artificial intelligence, and smooth animation and overall gameplay. 
### Authors and Contributors (GitHub usernames)
@modea320 @alexwhiteside1 @glogan dinkovs mlogalbo

### Support or Contact
Having trouble with Pages? Check out the documentation at http://help.github.com/pages or contact support@github.com and weâ€™ll help you sort it out.
